### **🔗 File Locations**
```
stock_analysis/[SYMBOL]/
├── data/
│   ├── [SYMBOL]_intraday_data.json
│   ├── [SYMBOL]_financial_ratios.json
│   └── [SYMBOL]_historical_3years.json
├── charts/ (23 total charts)
└── reports/ (HTML reports)
```
